sense.gloss: to lie down, to stretch out
to lie ahead (of danger, difficulty, etc.), to lie in wait

sdata.j: ↑椅子↑↓いす↓に|↑横↑↓よこ↓たわる|↑私↑↓わたし↓に、↑歯科↑↓しか↓↑衛生↑↓えいせい↓↑士↑↓し↓の↑女性↑↓じょせい↓が「はい、お↑口↑↓くち↓を↑開↑↓あ↓けてください」と↑言↑↓い↓ったのです。
sdata.e: The woman dental hygienist said to me, lying down in the chair, "Right, please open your mouth."
